title: PropertyDef
description: Definition of a property within an aspect in the Cheap data model

name.description: The unique name identifier for this property definition

type.description: The data type of this property

defaultValue.description: The default value of this property, which may be null

hasDefaultValue.description: Whether this property has a default value

isReadable.description: Whether properties of this type can be read

isWritable.description: Whether properties of this type can be written or modified

isNullable.description: Whether properties of this type can have null values

isRemovable.description: Whether properties of this type can be removed from their parent aspect

isMultivalued.description: Whether properties of this type can hold multiple values
